text: Angela Aames (February 27, 1956 in Pierre, South Dakota - November 27, 1988 in West Hills, California) was an American actress. She was famous for her role in the movie Bachelor Party. She died of heart problems at the age of 32. ==Other websites== * Category:1956 births Category:1988 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from South Dakota Category:People from Pierre, South Dakota Category:Disease-related deaths in Los Angeles Category:Deaths from heart disease
title: Angela Aames
